Thurs., Oct. 18: Join the ACLU of Pennsylvania's Young Leadership Outreach Team on to learn more.

Please join the our Young Leadership Outreach Team on Thursday, October 18 to learn about The State of Criminal Justice Reform in Pennsylvania!

We just released their blueprint roadmap for cutting incarceration by 50 percent, part of the ACLU's Smart Justice 50-State Blueprints project, a comprehensive, state-by-state analysis on how states can transform their criminal justice system.

We'll have Hayden Nelson-Major, ACLU-PA independence foundation fellow, with us to discuss what's going on in the commonwealth of Pennsylvania, what we have been up to in terms of criminal justice reform, and what we can do to help reduce mass incarceration.

Also joining us will be members of the Philadelphia Community Bail Fund, who will talk about their efforts to #endcashbail in Philly!

The State of Criminal Justice
Reform in Pennsylvania

Learn about our roadmap to cutting mass incarceration by 50 percent.

Thursday, October 18, 5:30 - 8 p.m.
Field House
1150 Filbert St.
Philadelphia, PA 19107

RSVP TODAY

Please invite your friends! This event is free and open to the public. Field House is an accessible venue.

Please contact YLOTPhilly@aclupa.org with any questions or requests for accommodation.

Thanks and we hope to see you there,

Philly Young Leadership Outreach Team
